name: Neutmare
overview: Published in Magic Disk 64 1988/09. Neutmare is a pong style game for head-to-head play for 1 or 2 players. Perhaps you can still remember the first video games and the 'tennis' game module that was so popular at the time. 'Neutmare' is a beefed up version of this popular game. Above all, the great music that plays in the background makes playing a real pleasure. After loading, you have two options: You can either play against the wall alone, or you can start with two people. Should you prefer to play alone, you will have to score a certain number of points in each line-up until you advance to the next level. In TWO-PLAYER mode, the winner is the one who is the first to score 15 points.
